title: why can´t i do any kills when playing?
body:
I started playing League of Legends couples days ago but I still can´t manage do a kill. I always die. 
Any tips?

replies.body:
League (and MOBAs in general) take time to get used to. I'd suggest playing with some friends and getting the hang of things like CSing (killing minions) and then find a champion you like the look of. Some good ones are Ashe, Janna, Master Yi, and Volibear. Once you find a champion you're comfortable with, work with your teammates to coordinate a kill or focus one person in a big teamfight. 

 Also, remember that League isn't all about kills! You can win a game and have a good time without ever killing someone. Good luck, and if you have any questions feel free to ask here or your teammates in game!

Lmao. This takes me back. I remember having the same exact problem when I started in season 5. The first time I killed a bot I felt like a fuckin pro. I can't believe killing a bot was once damn near impossible for me at one point.

I think it took me about a week or two before I could actually kill something in League. In hindsight, you need to reach a point where playing a champion is like walking. You don't need to think about how to walk, you just walk. You just need to keep playing. It'll come to you eventually.
